642.title: You grant perpetual license to anything you publish

tosdr.case: You grant perpetual license to anything you publish-bad-80
tosdr.tldr: You grant perpetual license to use anything you publish. While the global license expires when you unsubscribe, public content will remain licensed and will not be deleted.

877.quoteText: Contests, Surveys and Sweepstakes Data This personal data is used to allow you to sign up and participate in these types of promotions. The exact personal data collected will vary depending on the promotion.
877.title: Spotify may merge your current personal info with more if you participate in a Special Promotion

tosdr.case: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions
tosdr.tldr: If you participate in a Special Promotion (sweepstakes, contests, surveys), Spotify may ask for certain personal information in addition to what they already have. They may then combine that information with your current file.

905.quoteText:
IF YOU DO NOT WANT TO CONTINUE TO BE CHARGED ON A RECURRING MONTHLY BASIS, YOU MUST CANCEL THE APPLICABLE PAID SUBSCRIPTION THROUGH YOUR SPOTIFY ACCOUNT’S SUBSCRIPTION PAGE OR TERMINATE YOUR SPOTIFY ACCOUNT BEFORE THE END OF THE RECURRING MONTHLY PERIOD.
PAID SUBSCRIPTIONS CANNOT BE TERMINATED BEFORE THE END OF THE PERIOD FOR WHICH YOU HAVE ALREADY PAID, AND EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY PROVIDED IN THESE TERMS, SPOTIFY WILL NOT REFUND ANY FEES THAT YOU HAVE ALREADY PAID.
THE LIMITATION SECTION SETS FORTH ADDITIONAL TERMS REGARDING CANCELLATION OF YOUR PAID SUBSCRIPTION.
905.title: Spotify doesn't provide refunds

tosdr.case: The service has a no refund policy
tosdr.tldr: Spotify does not offer refunds upon termination of their services, either by you or Spotify.

1012.quoteText:
TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, SPOTIFY AND ALL OWNERS OF THE CONTENT MAKE NO REPRESENTATIONS AND DISCLAIM ANY WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF SATISFACTORY QUALITY, MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT.
NEITHER SPOTIFY NOR ANY OWNER OF CONTENT WARRANTS THAT THE SPOTIFY SERVICE IS FREE OF MALWARE OR OTHER HARMFUL COMPONENTS.
1012.title: Spotify gives no guarantee for quality of service

tosdr.case: This services gives no guarantee regarding quality
tosdr.tldr: There is no guarantee of quality of service. If the service is not delivered to your expectations, you still pay for it to the extent of applicable law.

1082.title: The ToS are only translated into a few languages

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
tosdr.tldr: Although Spotify allows users to choose their country (Andorra, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Monaco, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States), the terms themselves are only available in English, French, German, and Spanish.

1143.quoteText:
Technical Data which may include URL information, cookie data, your IP address, the types of devices you are using to access or connect to the Spotify Service, unique device IDs, device attributes, network connection type (e.g.
WiFi, 3G, LTE, Bluetooth) and provider, network and device performance, browser type, language, information enabling digital rights management, operating system, and Spotify application version.
1143.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr:
"All the information we collect is related to providing the Spotify service and its features."

and

"Technical and sensor information necessary to operate Spotify. This includes the type of browser and device you use, data from the touchscreen, and information from your device’s accelerometer and gyroscope sensors. This enables you to control Spotify and allows us to do simple things like rotate videos and recommend music based on whether you’re sitting still or running." (so no device fingerprinting for the purpose of advertising, like a lot of other services do).
